answers.author: Jesse Himes
answers.text:
Hi Pamela,
Check these articles out. Maybe they can help you create a successful strategy.
http://webapps.icma.org/pm/9408/public/pmplus1.cfm?title=Inside%2FOutside%3A%20The%20Hiring%20Options&subtitle=&author=Doug%20Miller%2C%20Clay%20Pearson%2C%20and%20Catherine%20Tuck%20Parrish
https://icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/303069
Jesse Himes, Knowledge Network Intern, jhimes@icma.org

author: Pamela Muse
text:

Pamela Muse
